name_localized.en: 1 King Bed ADA Room Roll-In Shower
name_localized.es: 1 King Bed ADA Room Roll-In Shower

short_description_localized.en: With a king bed in 200 square feet and roll-in shower, you’ll have all the comforts you need in the heart of Midtown.
short_description_localized.es: With a king bed in 200 square feet and roll-in shower, you’ll have all the comforts you need in the heart of Midtown.

description_localized.en:
Take advantage of our location near Midtown Manhattan’s many sights while enjoying the comforts of this 200-square-foot mobility accessible room with a luxurious king-size bed. The bath features a roll-in shower with grab bars throughout. The Hotel @ Fifth also offers an accessible breakfast room and fitness center. Max. 2 guests.

Room accessibility features include: low peephole and security latches - low thermostat controls - ADA chair upon request
